statements: SELECT * FROM employee_demographics;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM employee_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT last_name, first_name, department FROM employee_demographics WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM employee_demographics WHERE race_ethnicity = 'Hispanic' AND age < 40;
SELECT employee_id, position, hire_date FROM employee_demographics WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_demographics WHERE race_ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY department ASC, last_name DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT gender, race_ethnicity, department, position FROM employee_demographics WHERE department = 'Sales' OR department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY gender ASC, race_ethnicity DESC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM employee_demographics WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name, ethnicity FROM employee_demographics ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, metric_id, diversity_category FROM diversity_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE diversity_category='Diversity and Inclusion';
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employee_demographics WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE diversity_category = 'Diversity';
SELECT employee_id, metric_value FROM diversity_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT name, age FROM employees;
SELECT department, job_title FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_salaries WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE representation_pct < 50;
SELECT id, name, race_ethnicity FROM employees WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, name, job_title, department FROM employees WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT department, diversity_index, representation_pct FROM diversity_metrics WHERE representation_pct > 50 ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT name, job_title, salary, bonus FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_salaries ON employees.id = employee_salaries.employee_id WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC, name ASC;

SELECT name, race_ethnicity, department, diversity_index FROM employees JOIN diversity_metrics ON employees.department = diversity_metrics.department WHERE diversity_index > 0.7 ORDER BY department ASC;

SELECT job_title, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary, AVG(bonus) AS avg_bonus FROM employees JOIN employee_salaries ON employees.id = employee_salaries.employee_id GROUP BY job_title HAVING AVG(salary) > 60000 ORDER BY avg_salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_personal_info WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employee_personal_info WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT department, position, salary FROM employee_employment_info WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT race, ethnicity FROM employee_diversity_info WHERE race = 'White';
SELECT gender_identity FROM employee_equality_info WHERE diversity_hiring_initiative = true;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM employee_personal_info;
SELECT department, position, salary FROM employee_employment_info WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT race, ethnicity, disability_status FROM employee_diversity_info WHERE ethnicity = 'Hispanic';
SELECT sexual_orientation, gender_identity FROM employee_equality_info WHERE sexual_orientation = 'LGBTQ+';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department, position FROM employee_personal_info JOIN employee_employment_info ON employee_personal_info.employee_id = employee_employment_info.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeDemographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM EmployeeDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT employee_id, job_title, department FROM EmployeeJobDetails WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, salary + bonus AS total_compensation FROM EmployeeSalaries WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, hire_year, promotion_count FROM EmployeeEEOCData ORDER BY hire_year ASC, promotion_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeDemographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM EmployeeDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT employee_id, job_title, department, hire_date FROM EmployeeJobDetails ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, salary, bonus, benefits FROM EmployeeSalaries WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_rating >= 4 AND review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
